name: bookmiserver
description: This application will serve as the server for for the bookmi client application. It will be responsible for handling http request sent from the client application.

scripts.dev: SET NODE_ENV=development&&concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client

author: Patrick Forbes
